survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Co-Working Spaces
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of co-working spaces to understand their satisfaction levels, identify areas for improvement, and assess overall user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use co-working spaces?
questions.client_notes: Use a clear scale to gauge frequency of usage.

script.question_text: How often do you use co-working spaces?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use co-working spaces?
answer_options: Cost-effective compared to traditional office space
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unique responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio button with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you use co-working spaces?
answer_options: Cost-effective compared to traditional office space

questions.question_text: Which amenities do you value the most in a co-working space? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to understand priority amenities.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which amenities do you value the most in a co-working space? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness of the co-working space?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness of the co-working space?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the noise level in the co-working space?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced scale to assess noise levels.

script.question_text: How would you rate the noise level in the co-working space?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the internet speed and reliability?
questions.client_notes: Internet speed is critical for remote workers; measure satisfaction precisely.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the internet speed and reliability?

questions.question_text: Do you feel the pricing of the co-working space is fair for the services provided?
questions.client_notes: Pricing perception is key for retention; use a clear scale.

script.question_text: Do you feel the pricing of the co-working space is fair for the services provided?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this co-working space to others?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) question to gauge loyalty.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this co-working space to others?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for this co-working space?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for this co-working space?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in additional services or amenities (e.g., childcare, fitness center)?
questions.client_notes: Use a scale to measure interest in potential new services.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in additional services or amenities (e.g., childcare, fitness center)?
